name: Who Ya Gonna Call??- Pre Loved T-Shirt
description:
Calling everyone from the 80's! 
I was tempted to cut the neck of this one and make it more of a scoop neck, or maybe a v-neck but I thought I would leave that up to you.

Details...

- Size Small 
- Made in Mexico

If you have any questions about this garment or return policies please email me!

name: Pre Loved Rich & Skinny Jeans. Sold by the Slickest Sales Girl
description:
I bought these in a weak moment. I had never heard of this company and some how the sales girl convinced me they were the best investment ever and that they looked great on me. She picked them out, shoved me in a change room, then dragged me out to shower me with compliments. It all happened so fast, she was good. I will never admit to anyone how much I spent on these. 
I wore them once to a bachelorette party with platform heels and a flowy "blouse". 

Details...
- Rich & Skinny Jeans
- Size- 29. Pretty realisitc fit, I usually wear a 28 and these are a little loose on my waist. 
- High waisted
- Extra wide bottoms
- Dark denim
- Made in the USA

If you have any questions about this garment or return policies please email me!

name: Pre Loved Silky Scarf- Burnt Orange
description:
You can do so much with a good scarf. I have framed them, wore a few as tops, tied a few to handbags, used some to cover a table and perhaps the most valuable quality of a scarf is it's ability to cover up a bad hair day. 

Details
- 33 x 33 inches
- No tags
- Burnt oranges, rust, white, black, grey
- Equally pretty on both sides

If you have any questions about this garment or return policies please email me!

- Two exterior slip pockets

LINING OPTIONS 
Option 1- Organic canvas, natural 
Option 2- Repurposed garments. Jacket lining, skirts and scarves can be used to line a bag. If you chose this option I pick a fabric that will compliment the style and colour of your bag. 
Option 3- Hand dyed canvas. Canvas is dyed and silk screened with a variety of original graphics.
